# Log In

Please log in to access the website.

<div id="netlify-login-button" style="margin-top: 20px;">
  <button onclick="netlifyIdentity.open();">Log In</button>
</div>

<!-- Placeholder for showing logged-in user info -->
<div id="logged-in-info" style="margin-top: 20px;"></div>

<script>
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
    if (window.netlifyIdentity && window.netlifyIdentity.currentUser()) {
      document.getElementById('logged-in-info').innerText = 'You are logged in.';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('logged-in-info').innerText = 'You are not logged in.';
    }
  });
</script>
